50 #ifndef _power_electronics_h_
51 #define _power_electronics_h_
52 
53 #include "lib_battery_dispatch.h"
54 #include "lib_sandia.h"
55 #include "lib_pvinv.h"
56 
57 class inverter
58 {
59 public:
60  inverter(int inverter_type, int) {
61  _inverter_type = inverter_type;
62  }
63 
64  void set_sandia(sandia_inverter_t * sandia_inverter) { _sandia_inverter = sandia_inverter; }
65  void set_partlaod(partload_inverter_t * partload_inverter) { _partload_inverter = partload_inverter; }
66 
67 
68  void ac_power(double P_dc, double V_dc, double &P_ac)
69  {
70  double P_par, P_lr, Eff, P_cliploss, P_soloss, P_ntloss;
71  if (_inverter_type == SANDIA_INVERTER)
72  _sandia_inverter->acpower(P_dc, V_dc, &P_ac, &P_par, &P_lr, &Eff, &P_cliploss, &P_soloss, &P_ntloss);
73  else if (_inverter_type == PARTLOAD_INVERTER)
74  _partload_inverter->acpower(P_dc, &P_ac, &P_lr, &P_par, &Eff, &P_cliploss, &P_ntloss);
75  }
76  enum { SANDIA_INVERTER, DATASHEET_INVERTER, PARTLOAD_INVERTER, COEFFICIENT_GENERATOR, NONE };
77 
78 protected:
79  int _inverter_type;
80  int _num_inverters;
81 
82  sandia_inverter_t * _sandia_inverter;
83  partload_inverter_t * _partload_inverter;
84 };
85 
86 
87 class bidirectional_inverter
88 {
89 public:
90 
91  bidirectional_inverter(double ac_dc_efficiency, double dc_ac_efficiency)
92  {
93  _dc_ac_efficiency = 0.01*dc_ac_efficiency;
94  _ac_dc_efficiency = 0.01*ac_dc_efficiency;
95  }
96 
97  double dc_ac_efficiency() { return _dc_ac_efficiency; }
98  double ac_dc_efficiency() { return _ac_dc_efficiency; }
99 
100 
101  // return power loss [kW]
102  double convert_to_dc(double P_ac, double * P_dc);
103  double convert_to_ac(double P_dc, double * P_ac);
104 
105  // return increased power required, i.e 9 kWac may require 10 kWdc
106  double compute_dc_from_ac(double P_ac);
107 
108 
109 protected:
110  double _dc_ac_efficiency;
111  double _ac_dc_efficiency;
112 
113  double _loss_dc_ac;
114  double _loss_ac_dc;
115 };
116 
117 class dc_dc_charge_controller
118 {
119 public:
120 
121  dc_dc_charge_controller(double batt_dc_dc_bms_efficiency, double pv_dc_dc_mppt_efficiency)
122  {
123  _batt_dc_dc_bms_efficiency = 0.01*batt_dc_dc_bms_efficiency;
124  _pv_dc_dc_mppt_efficiency = 0.01*pv_dc_dc_mppt_efficiency;
125 
126  }
127 
128  double batt_dc_dc_bms_efficiency() { return _batt_dc_dc_bms_efficiency; };
129  double pv_dc_dc_mppt_efficiency() { return _pv_dc_dc_mppt_efficiency; };
130 
131 
132 protected:
133  double _batt_dc_dc_bms_efficiency;
134  double _pv_dc_dc_mppt_efficiency;
135  double _loss_dc_dc;
136 };
137 
138 class rectifier
139 {
140 public:
141  // don't know if I need this component in AC or DC charge controllers
142  rectifier(double ac_dc_efficiency) { _ac_dc_efficiency = 0.01 * ac_dc_efficiency; }
143  double ac_dc_efficiency() { return _ac_dc_efficiency; }
144 
145  // return power loss [kW]
146  double convert_to_dc(double P_ac, double * P_dc);
147 
148 protected:
149  double _ac_dc_efficiency;
150  double _loss_dc_ac;
151 };
152 // Charge controller base class
153 class charge_controller
154 {
155 public:
156  charge_controller(dispatch_t * dispatch, battery_metrics_t * battery_metrics, double efficiency_1, double efficiency_2);
157  virtual ~charge_controller();
158 
159  void initialize(double P_pv, double P_load, double P_pv_clipped, size_t index);
160 
161  // function to determine appropriate pv and load to send to battery
162  virtual void preprocess_pv_load() = 0;
163 
164  virtual void run(size_t year, size_t hour_of_year, size_t step_of_hour, size_t index, double P_pv, double P_load, double P_pv_clipped) = 0;
165  virtual void compute_to_batt_load_grid(double P_battery_ac_or_dc, double P_pv_ac_or_dc, double P_load_ac, double inverter_efficiency) = 0;
166 
167  // return power loss [kW]
168  virtual double gen_ac() = 0;
169  virtual double update_gen_ac(double P_gen_ac) = 0;
170 
171  void finalize();
172 
173  // iterative solution required
174  bool check_iterate();
175  void check_constraints();
176 
177  // ac outputs
178  double power_tofrom_battery() { return _P_battery; }
179  double power_tofrom_grid() { return _P_grid; }
180  double power_gen() { return _P_gen; }
181  double power_pv_to_load() { return _P_pv_to_load; }
182  double power_battery_to_load() { return _P_battery_to_load; }
183  double power_grid_to_load() { return _P_grid_to_load; }
184  double power_pv_to_batt() { return _P_pv_to_battery; }
185  double power_grid_to_batt() { return _P_grid_to_batt; }
186  double power_pv_to_grid() { return _P_pv_to_grid; }
187  double power_battery_to_grid() { return _P_battery_to_grid; }
188  double power_conversion_loss() { return _P_loss; }
189  double power_system_loss() { return _P_system_loss; }
190 
191  enum { DC_CONNECTED, AC_CONNECTED };
192 
193 protected:
194 
195  dispatch_t * _dispatch;
196  dispatch_t * _dispatch_initial;
197 
198  battery_metrics_t * _battery_metrics;
199 
200  // ac powers to report
201  double _P_load;
202  double _P_grid;
203  double _P_grid_to_load;
204  double _P_grid_to_batt;
205  double _P_gen;
206  double _P_battery_to_load;
207  double _P_pv_to_load;
208  double _P_pv_to_battery;
209  double _P_pv_to_grid;
210  double _P_battery_to_grid;
211  double _P_battery;
212  double _P_system_loss;
213  double _P_loss;
214  double _P_inverter_draw;
215 
216  // ac or dc pv input
217  double _P_pv;
218 
219  // inputs to battery dispatch
220  double _P_pv_dc_discharge_input;
221  double _P_pv_dc_charge_input;
222  double _P_load_dc_discharge_input;
223  double _P_load_dc_charge_input;
224  double _P_pv_dc_clipped;
225 
226  // does battery need to iterate
227  bool _iterate;
228 
229  // index of simulation
230  size_t _index;
231 
232 };
233 
234 class dc_connected_battery_controller : public charge_controller
235 {
236 public:
237  dc_connected_battery_controller(dispatch_t * dispatch,
238  battery_metrics_t * battery_metrics,
239  double batt_dc_dc_bms_efficiency,
240  double pv_dc_dc_mppt_efficiency,
241  double inverter_efficiency);
242  ~dc_connected_battery_controller();
243 
244  void preprocess_pv_load();
245  void run(size_t year, size_t hour_of_year, size_t step_of_hour, size_t index, double P_pv, double P_load, double P_pv_clipped = 0);
246  void process_dispatch();
247  void compute_to_batt_load_grid(double P_battery_ac, double P_pv_dc, double P_load_ac, double inverter_efficiency);
248  double gen_ac() { return 0.; };
249  double update_gen_ac(double P_gen_ac);
250 
251 
252 protected:
253  dc_dc_charge_controller * _dc_dc_charge_controller;
254  double _inverter_efficiency;
255 };
256 
257 class ac_connected_battery_controller : public charge_controller
258 {
259 public:
260  ac_connected_battery_controller(dispatch_t * dispatch, battery_metrics_t * battery_metrics, double ac_dc_efficiency, double dc_ac_efficiency);
261  ~ac_connected_battery_controller();
262 
263  void preprocess_pv_load();
264  void run(size_t year, size_t hour_of_year, size_t step_of_hour, size_t index, double P_pv, double P_load, double P_pv_clipped = 0);
265  void process_dispatch();
266  void compute_to_batt_load_grid(double P_battery_ac, double P_pv_ac, double P_load_ac, double inverter_efficiency = 0.);
267 
268  double gen_ac();
269  double update_gen_ac(double)
270  {
271  // nothing to do
272  return 0.;
273  }
274 
275 protected:
276  bidirectional_inverter * _bidirectional_inverter;
277 };
